=== What ===

Party Hardy of course! :) We are looking for places we can hold this meeting and ideas. Jono has set up a few resources for the LoCos already. Take a look at the following:

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BuildingCommunity/RunningReleaseParty|RunningReleaseParty]]</nowiki><<BR>><nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardyReleaseParties|Hardy Release Parties]]</nowiki>

=== Who & Where ===

Everyone is invited. 

If you want to be there, just RSVP for the party location of your choice.

=== Where (Place) & When ===
